seo.metaTitle: Engineering Digital Assets That Pass Due Diligence
seo.metaDescription: Gimmir builds investor-ready software. We deliver MVPs, dedicated engineering teams, and code rescue services that survive technical due diligence.
Get in touch with Gimmir. Schedule a consultation to discuss your software development needs.
Technical insights, engineering best practices, and strategic advice for CTOs and founders.
Learn about Gimmir - our mission, values, and the team behind investor-ready software development.
Our proven methodology for delivering production-ready software that passes technical due diligence.
Launch your startup MVP in 6-8 weeks. Production-ready code that passes technical due diligence and scales with your growth.
Scale your engineering capacity with vetted, senior developers who integrate seamlessly with your existing team.
Full-stack web and mobile application development with modern technologies and best practices.
Cloud architecture, infrastructure automation, and DevOps practices that ensure scalability and reliability.
Rescue failing projects, eliminate technical debt, and prepare your codebase for investor due diligence.
